Amruthaballi traditionally used to manage fevers, infections, and digestive issues
This hearty green climber is known for its ability to boost immunity, detoxify the body
Lemongrass with tall slender leaves, widely used in Ayurveda
Herbal plant believed to lower blood pressure and boost oral health
Citrusy herbal plant rich in citral compound with antimicrobial effects
Fresh lemongrass stalks commonly brewed into calming herbal tea
